title: Checkbox Component Contract
description: Contract extracted from Figma Untitled UI Checkbox component. This defines all required properties that the LIT component must implement.

source.notes: ⚠️ PENDING: Component properties need to be extracted from Figma via MCP. NodeId confirmed, awaiting design_context data.

size.notes: Size determines the checkbox dimensions and typography scale

checked.notes: Controls checked/unchecked state. Visual: checkmark icon appears when true

indeterminate.description: Whether the checkbox is in indeterminate state (partially checked)
indeterminate.notes: Checkbox only (not for Radio). Visual: horizontal line instead of checkmark. Used for 'select all' scenarios

state.notes: State is typically managed via CSS pseudo-classes (:hover, :focus-visible) and disabled attribute, not as a component property

text.description: Whether to show the label text ('Remember me')
text.notes: In Figma, boolean prop to show/hide label. In code, label is provided via slot content

supportingText.description: Whether to show supporting text ('Save my login details for next time.')
supportingText.notes: In Figma, boolean prop. In code, can be implemented as separate slot or property

notes: All Figma component properties must have corresponding LIT component @property decorators
State management should use CSS pseudo-classes for hover/focus, not component properties
Additional web-specific props (name, value, ariaLabel, required) are acceptable and not in Figma
text and supportingText in Figma are booleans; in code they are slots or string properties
All property values extracted from Figma design context
